email_content:
Hi Academic Alliance Team,

I hope you’re all doing well. A quick heads-up that our upcoming study session has been **rescheduled** due to a scheduling conflict.

NEW DETAILS
Date: Monday, 21 February
Time: 3:00 PM – 5:00 PM
Location: Library Study Room 204 (our usual spot)

PROPOSED AGENDA
1. Brief review of last week’s topics
2. Discussion of new material (Chapters 4 & 5)
3. Group exercises on statistical methods
4. Preparation for the upcoming mid-term exam
5. Open Q&A / next steps

Please come prepared with questions and any specific topics you’d like to discuss. If the new time causes any issues, just let me know.

Looking forward to seeing everyone on Monday!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
